Text:
Great show!! Bunch of weirdo's, and funny as hell..,
Guess they could have made the show 12 episodes instead of 6, but maybe next year if the show goes for another run..  :)
Download and enjoy ppl..,

This show is WHY television was invented !!
The best thing since....the wheel !!
DL and laugh yer guts out.
I could see anyone of these heroes teaming up with "The Tick" (who could whoop spidey's ass anytime) The DL of the century
